citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45pm on
06-Jun-19.
Arrived at facility and made contact with an adult on premise. No responsible adult with knowledge of the regulated
activity was available to facilitate the inspection Discussed the requirement for a responsible adult to be made
available during business hours to accompany APHIS officials on inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45pm on
06-Jun-19.
Arrived at facility and made contact with an adult on premise. No responsible adult with knowledge of the regulated
activity was available to facilitate the inspection Discussed the requirement for a responsible adult to be made
available during business hours to accompany APHIS officials on inspection.
